long_description: This down-insulated Exped DownMat 7 UL air mattress is ultralight, warm and compact, and provides excellent year-round comfort. 700-fill-power goose down provides unmatched warmth-to-weight ratio for a restful night's sleep. UV- and abrasion-resistant polyester fabric is slip-proof; high frequency welded seams are airtight. Separators between down-filled baffle chambers prevent cold spots and create thick, stable and comfortable cushioning. Welded, low-profile, dual valves ensure quick inflation and deflation. Also includes repair kit with adhesive and fabric patches. Inflate sleeping pad with the included Exped Schnozzel Pumpbag that doubles as a waterproof compression bag.
short_description: This down-insulated Exped DownMat 7 UL air mattress is ultralight, warm and compact, and provides excellent year-round comfort.
